name: Spicie R
text: The food is always fresh and the staff is Awesome! Most of the time I place my order online and then pick it up and it is always ready to go as soon as I arrive. Definitely recommend!

name: karen booker
text: The pizza is great!

name: Stormie Kidd
text: Disgusting pizza was very disappointed ended up throwing both pizzas away because they were seriously that awful. üôÑüôÑ First experience there you would have thought they would put some effort into it so they could have more buisness.... I'm honestly surprised seeing good reviews from this place.....

name: Grahab Attacock
text: I order pizza for the sole purpose of Jacob coming to my porch. Hopefully one of these times he can come in so we can sit on the patio with cigars and whiskey while discussing life. Maybe things can get a little spicy while we‚Äôre at it. Jacob is a goat. üò§

text: Great service. Jacob was very helpful on my big order food was amazing!

name: Ella Aragon

text: I love this place. I order a lot. Jacob is a so nice & Donna is so sweet on the phone.

name: Lakiesha Olden
text: The worst experience ever.....im done with snappys....fries under cooked....they serve gummy bacon inside calzones. And rude delivery service....never again

name: Toni Roberto
text: I love Snappy Tomato Pizza but unfortunately right now I'm on a diet and I can't have it. I really miss it

text: Good food and service!  Excellent value for your money.

name: Seth Dehart
text: Snappy is awesome. Great deals!

name: Ohioan 1
text: The pizza is very good.  Better then Dominos or Papa Johns anyway with lots of flavor and the crust is perfect and not overly thick like the other places where you eating mostly bread.

text: I LOVE the food! amazing and a fast delivery! can you eat in the restaurant ? that would be awesome?

name: Eric Tirey
text: Very clean and good place to eat for all members of the family. Have had nothing but good experiences there and very nice and friendly workers.

name: Teresa Wise
text: Luv the steak hogies!!  Pizza is better than most delivery chains!!  It's all about the sauce & snappy tomato has good sauce!!!  ; )

name: zachary carlson
text: One of my favorite pizza places

name: mikekarenk
text: Food not good at all. Snap fries were so greasy that they were mushy. We order 1 hoagy and veggie melt cheese was so brunt you could not tell them apart. They took a med or small pizza crust and cut them into breadsticks.  Food seems to get worse with the last 2 orders.

name: Jamie Tuttle
text: It's good for the price and the food isn't that bad either

name: Courtney Moore
text: Very good food for a great price :) gotta love the beast

text: Fast service. Friendly employees.

name: Richard Inman
text: Good Chicago Style and great gluten free thin crust

name: Jeremy Smith
text: We ordered online, confirmation email and all. When we went to pick up they said that they had no such order. After we showed them the email they went ahead and made our order, had to wait once again.

text: Great food!!! Enough food for everyone!! Great wings, pizza, and hogiesüçïüçï

text: Good pizza, good delivery. I don't pick them up very often, and it wasn't ready when I got there, but the manager made it up.
